DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : This study evaluate efficacy eScreen internet psychiatry patient treat major depressive disorder , panic anxiety social phobia . The eScreen brief Internet intervention problematic alcohol drug use offer self-screening , in-depth self-reporting , personalize feedback treatment recommendation well electronic diary . Progress time show diagram detail consumption level . Method : This two-armed randomized control design , measure outcome term change problematic alcohol use one year study recruitment . Participants problematic alcohol use ( AUDIT > 7 men > 5 woman ) and/or problematic drug use ( DUDIT > 1 men woman ) randomize one two group : T1 , eScreen referral Control group . Outcomes alcohol drug use well health-related symptom assess 3 , 6 12 month . The hypothesis group receive eScreen intervention reduce alcohol/drug use large extent control group follow-up compare baseline level .
DOC.brief_title: Substance-focused SBI Complement Internet-based Psychiatric Treatment : RCT
